courses.name: PLTW Computer Integrated Manufacturing - G/T
courses.description: This course applies principles of robotics and automation and builds on computer solid modeling skills developed in Introduction to Engineering Design. Students use computer-controlled equipment to produce models of three-dimensional designs. Fundamental concepts of robotics used in automated manufacturing and design analysis are included.
courses.prerequisites: PLTW Introduction to Engineering Design - G/T
